text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Monday’s episode, Kiran Jadhav, chief managing director at Kiran Jadhav & Associates and Parthiv Shah, director at TRACOM Stock Brokers gave their views on stocks to invest while entering the market, along with Torrent Power, Amara Raja Batteries, STEL Holdings and many more.
title: Buy, Sell Or Hold? How Should You Play These Mid-Cap Stocks #AskBQ
